text: Allahe paraitra kaba gharaka, paraitra mahaka, hada'i arau galarad'dha jantuko manuhara kalyanara babe nirdharaita karaiche. E'ito e'i babe ye, yate tomaloke janiba paraa, niscaya akasasamuhata yi ache arau prthiraita yi ache allahe seya jane arau niscaya allaha sakalo bastu samparke samyaka aragata
